mapper.select: SELECT ac.clue_content FROM ai_keyword ak INNER JOIN ai_keyword_clue akc ON akc.keyword_id = ak.id INNER JOIN ai_clue ac ON ac.id = akc.clue_id WHERE #{content} LIKE CONCAT('%', ak.key_name, '%') GROUP BY ac.id ORDER BY ac.weight DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT ac.clue_content AS clueContent, GROUP_CONCAT(ak.key_name) AS keywords, ac.weight FROM ai_keyword ak INNER JOIN ai_keyword_clue akc ON akc.keyword_id = ak.id INNER JOIN ai_clue ac ON ac.id = akc.clue_id GROUP BY ac.id
mapper.delete: DELETE ac, akc FROM ai_clue ac INNER JOIN ai_keyword_clue akc ON akc.clue_id = ac.id WHERE ac.id = #{clueId}
